content: *chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet then double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next single_crochet chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet single_crochet in 3rd double_crochet repeat from * to middle of the final 5-double_crochet shell then chain 3 skip 2 double_crochet double_crochet in 3rd & final double_crochet or chain-3 turn row 7 chain 6 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain 4 skip next chain-3 space double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in chain-3 space between 2 double_crochet s *chain 4 skip 2 chain-3 sps double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in next chain-3 space between 2 double_crochet s repeat from * to final chain-3 space between double_crochet s chain 4 double_crochet in chain-6 space chain 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain of chain-6 space turn row 8 chain 6 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain 3 single_crochet in chain-4 space *chain 3 double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 single_crochet in chain-4 space 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in next chain-3 space single_crochet in next chain-4 space repeat from * until placing a single_crochet in the row s final chain-4 space chain 3 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain of beg chain-6 turn row 9 chain 6 double_crochet in next chain-3 space *chain 4 double_crochet ch3 double_crochet in chain-3 space which is between either 1 or 3 double_crochet on each side depending on how the previous row ended repeat from * so that the double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet is alternately placed in the double_crochet ch3 double_crochet space and the 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet space end with a chain 4 double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain of previous row s beg chain-6 turn row 10 chain 6 double_crochet in next chain-3 space chain 3 single_crochet in chain-4 space now look 2 row below where you last did shells and determine whether or not a 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet shell is place directly below the current row s next chain-3 space if the answer is yes there is a 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet shell below then * chain-3 double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in chain-3 space chain 3 single_crochet in chain-4 space then work 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet in the next chain-3 space single_crochet in next chain-4 space and repeat from * up to the row s final chain-4 space however if the answer is no there is not a 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet shell below then reverse the order to work the 3 double_crochet chain 3 3 double_crochet shell before the double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet shell and repeat up to the row s final chain-4 space end with a chain 3 double_crochet chain 3 double_crochet in 3rd chain of previous row s beg chain-6 turn row 11 repeat row 9 & 10 in that order until the length from the beginning of row 6 to the end of a current row matches/meets your #2 hip-to-below bust measurement turn do not tie off edging chain 1 single_crochet in top of previous row s final double_crochet
